Cobourg, Ontario

Cobourg is right on Lake Ontario east of Toronto. It is the main rail link and shopping area for Castleton. Cobourg still has many of its large stately homes, although quite a few of them have been converted to other uses. Please let us know if you have any additional pictures of Cobourg that we may use. Click on the thumbnail view here to see a larger version of the picture. Then click "back" on your browser to return to this page.
